Resource.name: SalesOpportunityReasonsSetupService
Resource.Summary: This API enables you to invoke the interfaces defined on 'SalesOpportunityReasonsSetupService'.

Function.Description: Invoke the method 'GetSalesOpportunityReasonSetupList' on this service.

DataTypes.Description: The 'DataTypes' defines the types referenced by the 'Functions'. It is only for QA, not for info dev.
